MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH16 postcode area of Edinburgh. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to carry out a permanent repair to a severely damaged roadside link box, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:30pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:04pm on Saturday 20th February 2021.
